description:
One day, Renji goes to an abandoned train station in town he would often frequent to read at since it is so quiet there and meets a girl wearing an eyepatch over her left eye and sitting alone named Chihiro Shindo. Despite them being mutually shy, Renji comes back to see her at the station every day after school and quickly becomes friends with her.
(Renji is half German, half Japanese)
name: Asou Renji
